actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend Section 144 of Title 23 of the United States Code, relating to the special bridge replacement program, in order to make highway bridge projects costing more than one million dollars in those States receiving minimum apportionments of federal funds under such program eligible for federal aid under the discretionary part of the program.

summary.text: Amends the special bridge replacement program (23 U.S.C. 144), to make highway bridge projects costing more than $1,000,000 in those States receiving minimum apportionments of Federal funds under such program eligible for Federal aid under the discretionary part of the program.

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 144 of Title 23 of the United States Code, relating to the special bridge replacement program, in order to make highway bridge projects costing more than one million dollars in those States receiving minimum apportionments of federal funds under such program eligible for federal aid under the discretionary part of the program.
